An ode to salad
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: An ode to salad
By Djinnmastr on Wednesday, June 5, 2002 - 07:09 pm:

I once owned a monster by name of salad
it is for him i am writing this ballad
the first monster i raised was he
much joy he brought me along with much glee
but alas, poor salad was was always mistreated
despite though in battle he was never defeated
but i acted horribly, i must attest
he was constantly worked with no bit of rest
he went every week with no scrap of food
but he never complained, never got rude
he took it all in, and gave it his all
but alas, poor salad, eventually did fall
he couldn't go on, and finally one night
he chose to give up, and in the twilight
his poor little body, battered and beaten
gasped its last breath, and moved on to heaven
and i was left, plagued my remorse
grieving my friend, who was set on his course
to the great beyond, where he finally found bliss
while i cried in the darkness; my friend i did miss
salad was a champ, the best, i must say
but he sure tasted good for lunch the next day
